nodes.text: The DL-21 blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol produced by BlasTech Industries. Dengar had a holstered DL-21 when aboard the Executor shortly after the Battle of Hoth. Din Djarin kept a DL-21 aboard the Razor Crest. The Devaronian Burg utilized two DL-21s during a mission to rescue Qin.
